max_batch_size.description: maximum batch size of output serving model can support

input_model.description: file path of a pre-trained model which can be Keras h5 model(*.h5), TensorFlow checkpoint or frozen graph(*.pb)

script_path.description: file path of a model script which describes the model structure especially custom layers or operations , optional

input_layer_names.description: required when input model is Keras h5 model

output_layer_names.description: required when input model is Keras h5 model

input_names.description: input tensor names, required when input model is TensorFlow checkpoint or frozen graph

output_names.description: output tensor names, required when input model is TensorFlow checkpoint or frozen graph

input_signatures.description: alias of inputs, required when serving_type is tf

output_signatures.description: alias of outputs, required when serving_type is tf
